author: kayyagari
msg: o added a new interface to handle the connection closed event raised due to any network issues
o implemented support for notifying registered ConnectionClosedEventListenerS when the session gets closed

author: veithen
msg: Use dynamic port allocation in HTTP tests (instead of hardcoded port 8280).
